categories: Category:Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic Omnibus

nodes.text: Star Wars Omnibus: Knights of the Old Republic Volume 2

Omnibus: Knights of the Old Republic Volume 2 is an Star Wars Omnibus-series trade paperback collecting issues #19 through #37 of the Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic comic book series. It was published on December 24, 2013.

After Zayne Carrick is framed for the murder of his fellow Jedi in training, his poor luck prevents him from clearing his name and throws him into dangerous situations all over the galaxy, leading to his final confrontation with the Jedi Masters who massacred their own Padawans!
